page.title: 20WEST CHILTINGTON FINALE
page.content: The work for this{'Domesday Survey' has been undertaken in June 1985 by staff and pupils of{West Chiltington and{Thakeham County First Schools. At W.Chilt.School the{Reception}class went on a farm walk with their teacher {Mrs.Lyne.}The{Top Infants,}with{Miss {West}the{Head Mistress,}and{Mrs.James, studied{St.Mary's Church.}The younger {Junior}children aged 7-9 with{Mr.Smith {Boyes}the{Deputy Head,}wrote and analysed a{questionaire}from which has come much of the writing. They also did the{Amenity}count, mostly noughts, and the{Land Cover Survey.}The older {Junior}children with{Mrs.Kelly}visited many of the old houses in the village. The work written about{Thakeham}was organised by{Mrs.Llewelyn}the{Head {Mistress. Grateful thanks are due to all those in both villages who helped in any way
